Bloodwedding_SD_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - CU/OTS looking at DU slayer, menacing. Cut on snarl

Bloodwedding_SD_17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_17.text: Lord Bhaal shall have but one Chosen.
Bloodwedding_SD_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - end snarl from previous shot. Profile shot framing Slayer top left and Orin lower right. alien queen-esque Faceoff. With Bhall insignia blasing behind them.

Bloodwedding_SD_16.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_16.text: *Memories flood back - snatches of your story, written in the blood of a thousand victims.*
Bloodwedding_SD_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

Bloodwedding_SD_67.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_67.text: *Years spent in worship of Bhaal, leading his savage congregation in prayer, sacrifice, and slaughter.*

Bloodwedding_SD_65.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_65.text: *You were their Master, and he was yours. A cruel Master, a Dread Lord... a devoted Father.*

Bloodwedding_SD_71.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_71.text: *All is greater than you could have dreamed. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
Bloodwedding_SD_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

Bloodwedding_SD_24.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_24.text: Revel in the memories of murder.

Bloodwedding_SD_51.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_51.text: *The cruelty of the Slayer leaps around within.*

Bloodwedding_SD_38.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_38.text: *Dear sister must die by your hand, an offering in Bhaal's sanctum.*

Bloodwedding_SD_27.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_27.text: *Your heart pines for the love of your Lord.*

Bloodwedding_SD_30.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_30.text: *Today is a wonderful day for murder.*
Bloodwedding_SD_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge will always transform back into normal form in gameplay the second this cutscene is over.

Bloodwedding_SD_37.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_37.text: Shudder. This has gone too far.

Bloodwedding_SD_44.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_44.text: *If you want to be free of your Urge, you must confront your past.*

Bloodwedding_SD_56.text: Recall that there was another - the woman beneath your feet.

Bloodwedding_SD_9.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_9.text: *You are not the last of your name. Not yet.*

Bloodwedding_SD_50.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.

Bloodwedding_SD_28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_28.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.
[MK] - Player wakes, sits up into focus and is confronted by the image of the temple. Slowly stands up while looking around.

Bloodwedding_SD_13.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_13.text: You have disobeyed your Father's wishes one time too many.
Bloodwedding_SD_13.context:
CinematicNodeContext:  Orin beckons the DU closer.The Dark Urge approaches the altar.
[MK] - DU eyes lock onto something high off screen.

Bloodwedding_SD_19.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_19.text: There was much disappointment at your reluctance to kill the little Moonmaiden.

Bloodwedding_SD_35.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_35.text: Your inheritance of your estate depends on you maintaining a healthy stream of kills.

Bloodwedding_SD_8.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_8.text: Another will embrace what you have rejected.
Bloodwedding_SD_8.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Orin's body starts to transform, once Bhaal's icon has lit up.
[MK] - Orin rolls/spins off the altar, raising dagger to player.

Bloodwedding_SD_7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_7.text: And that other will be your death.
Bloodwedding_SD_7.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Orin becomes the slayer.
[MK] - frame in as they square off against eachother. Cut to DU as they become slayer form

Bloodwedding_SD_63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_63.text: But your Father loves you dearly. You may reinherit yourself yet.
Bloodwedding_SD_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Slayer Orin steps on the Dark Urge, threatening them.

Bloodwedding_SD_45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_45.text: Slaughter your line. Become the last of your name.
Bloodwedding_SD_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - CU/OTS looking at DU slayer, menacing. Cut on snarl

Bloodwedding_SD_79.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_79.text: Lord Bhaal shall have but one Chosen.
Bloodwedding_SD_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - end snarl from previous shot. Profile shot framing Slayer top left and Orin lower right. alien queen-esque Faceoff. With Bhall insignia blasing behind them.

Bloodwedding_SD_76.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_76.text: *This is the truth lost in your mangled memories. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
Bloodwedding_SD_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

Bloodwedding_SD_22.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_22.text: *All is as you feared. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
Bloodwedding_SD_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

Bloodwedding_SD_66.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_66.text: Tense up. That may be what you were, but it is not who you are.

Bloodwedding_SD_31.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_31.text: *And yet you know you will never be free of your Urge if you don't confront your past.*

Bloodwedding_SD_34.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_34.text: Surrender to the Urge. Perhaps it is time to embrace your heritage.

Bloodwedding_SD_58.text: All those deaths by your hand. How can you ever atone?

Bloodwedding_SD_4.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_4.text: *There is another. The abomination wrapped in flesh you saw in the colony. Orin.*

Bloodwedding_SD_75.speaker: Narrator
Bloodwedding_SD_75.text: *But be wary of your confessors. Will friend turn to foe, knowing what you are?*

Bloodwedding_SD_64.text: Recall that there was another - the woman who became the Slayer.

Bloodwedding_SD_62.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_62.text: Tonight, you are the monster everyone claims you are.
Bloodwedding_SD_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.

Bloodwedding_SD_78.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
Bloodwedding_SD_78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge stumbles and falls in the middle of the road; fade to red. Hears the butler giggling as they collapse.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_61.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_61.text: Get up! Get up! Quit malingering in your red dreams.
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_61.context: CinematicNodeContext: Tav is tossing in their sleep, and the sound of many screams in unison fills their head. Butler appears and yells at them

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_47.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_47.text: You have squandered your inheritance. Oaf, Bhaalslug!

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_48.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_48.text: The Slayer is an ill-fitting suit, not tailored to that lazed body you have left to waste away.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_16.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_16.text: I will lock it away, perhaps never to be worn again.
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: VFX - something bad happening to the player - they are no longer in possession of the slayer

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_49.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_49.text: You should have stayed dead in the Temple as Bhaal's ritual lamb, rather than bear the shame of crawling back to life after your defeat.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_64.text: I really thought I could win the fight.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_11.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_11.text: My simpering lordling, you failed the entrance exam your august Father shed his very seed to prepare you for.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_37.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_37.text: And I, your only tutor, feel naught but humiliation for letting your education fall so short.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_32.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_32.text: Never before has a Bhaalspawn left a Blood Wedding at the altar. What were you doing, coward, not facing your sister?

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_36.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_36.text: To tell the truth: I was afraid.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_30.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_30.text: I will not fault you for fear. You think I don't fear Bhaal?

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_24.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_24.text: Fear of Bhaal ruins me. No matter how many times I am reborn - the rotted phoenix rising from sheer agony - I can never get my heart to slow its tormenting lurches.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_9.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_9.text: The only moments of hope amidst the terror are snatched from the dark when I am around you, Master.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_53.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_53.text: But you didn't fear only Bhaal. You feared yourself. That I shall never forgive.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_20.text: Begone. Leave me in peace at last.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_63.text: Hee hee! You speak of the Urge as if it were some enchantment or curse. My dear, disgraced Master: the Urge is you.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_7.text: Now that you have failed Bhaal, the Urge shall come calling to claim you, the moment that tadpole is not in your head.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_12.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_12.text: You will not be your clever self, murderous erudite. Stupid, stupid bastard orphan baby.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_28.text: When you have reached the depths of your lunacy, you shall reflect the time we spent together as your flower-days.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_2.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_2.text: Ruined mind waxing ever-red, with less reason than a feral ratling, crawling from ditch to sewer, suckling on your dagger's rust.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_1.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_1.text: It seems your cruelty was uninspired in the end.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_57.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_57.text: To call you 'Master' brings me shame.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_60.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_60.text: Won't you stay with me? Until the end...

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_17.text: There was a day where I longed for your caress. I dreamed of sitting like a pup in the lap of the Slayer.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_27.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_27.text: But it is not to be.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_14.text: The world will still be subdued by my hand. Alone, without Bhaal's meddling.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_8.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_8.text: What's the point in all that brutalising domination if you don't have a family to go back to at the end of the day?

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_39.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_39.text: I am not needed. As you are disinherited, I have no Liege to serve.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_52.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_52.text: A Butler lives to serve. And as I can no longer serve, I will surely die. Once and for all.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_62.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_62.text: I hate you, Master. I hate you, I hate you, I hate you.
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_62.context: NodeContext: Sniffling bawling his eyes out, very childish.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_6.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_6.text: For what it's worth: I'm sorry.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_29.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_29.text: Not half as sorry as I, who lived for you alone. Goodbye, Master.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_3.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_3.text: Not now. You have killed me by robbing me of all purpose.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_65.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_65.text: They won't write books of you, but if they do, let history tell: Sceleritas Fel died of a broken heart.
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_65.context: CinematicNodeContext: Butler has death animation used in GLO_DarkUrge_Butler default dialogue

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_19.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_19.text: Save me, then. I'll do whatever you want.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_68.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_68.text: I don't want anything. Every moment we were together, I was perfectly content. But now...

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_38.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_38.text: Not if I become an illithid first.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_26.text: Perhaps it would be for the best, at least they bear some dignity.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_13.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_13.text: Lies, this city will be mine yet. You will see.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_69.text: You shall be a naked filthy piglet soon, supping on bones. You shall hardly be able to defecate in the corner, yet alone rule the world.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_66.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_66.text: Oh... It still pains me to see my little liege in distress. Oh, please, don't cry. I... will always love you. But I must go.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_35.text: Is this the end of my Urges?

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_46.text: I can still subdue the Coast. I will prove myself worthy again.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_15.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_15.text: Is there any way I can make it up to Bhaal?

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_31.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_31.text: Bhaal will never restore you, abortive spawn.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_4.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_4.text: But the Lord's line cannot end. If you ever heed a single word from me, heed this: Go forth and breed widely. Sire a new legion, and set them upon self-slaughter.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_51.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_51.text: Your fertile organ is now your sole weapon. Combined, potent worm and gravid womb may honour Bhaal's name.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_0.text: I needed to guarantee that Bhaal would not claim me as his Chosen.

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_40.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
SkippedTempleFinale_SD_40.text: Why... why...? I adored you. I never expected you to demonstrate such resplendent mediocrity, such impotence!

SkippedTempleFinale_SD_44.text: I don't remember... it's all a blur.
